segments.text: Ugh, what a disgusting mess with that overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's just dumping everywhere, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing right in it, totally ignorant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe must be sopping wet now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids are climbing around in this filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's hand is deep in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who knows if those cookies are even clean anymore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, probably getting water splashes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's widening, full of who knows what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets dripping waterâ€”it's all so gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the nice garden view can't save this sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a dirty kitchen disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dish towel looks damp from the spray too.
segments.speaker: PAR
